org.apache.pig.backend.hadoop.executionengine.spark.plan

Class SparkOperator

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.pig.impl.plan.Operator<SparkOpPlanVisitor>
      • org.apache.pig.backend.hadoop.executionengine.spark.plan.SparkOperator
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Serializable, Cloneable, Comparable<Operator>
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    NativeSparkOperator

    public class SparkOperator
extends Operator<SparkOpPlanVisitor>
    An operator model for a Spark job. Acts as a host to the plans that will execute in spark.
    See Also:
